name: T.A.C. Heroes: Big Red One
description:
From the North African Coast to the shores of Sicily and the forests of central Europe, men of the 1st Infantry Division led the way toward the liberation of Europe and the eventual defeat of the AXIS powers. Italians, Vichy French, and Germans all faced and fought these gallant men across the battlefields of Europe and North Africa. For the first time on a handheld, the exploits of one of the Allied’s most famous divisions will be brought to gamers everywhere. With over 36 scenarios and 2 Campaigns, players will try their hand at leading a squad of men to victory. These men were truly Tactical Action Combat Heroes!
